name: European Candle Association
goal:
The European Candle Association is a federation of the leading European candle manufacturing companies. ECA´s member companies produce candles in 14 European countries and represent more than 50 % of the European candle production. The association represents its members´ interests especially in relation to the following topics:

- Maintenance, research and development with regards to safety, health and environmental protection

- Maintaining and increasing quality of candles

- Standardisation work

- Identification of new raw materials and development of new technologies
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives: Safety requirements or standardisation mandate for candles, candle base materials and accessories
